snippet: A man and woman in their 70s and a teenage boy were found dead in a three-story brick house that burned in the Soundview neighborhood early Monday.
abstract: Three people die in house fire as deadly flames rip through three-story Bronx home.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and ALEX VADUKUL

lead_paragraph: A man and woman in their 70s and a teenage boy were found dead in a three-story brick house that burned in the Soundview neighborhood early Monday.

headline.main: Three People Are Killed in a House Fire in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Three People Are Killed in a House Fire in the Bronx
